means: 可衡量的，可估量的，可测量的

sentence.Network_en: All ponderable bodies are constantly in motion in through space.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有有重量的物质都不断地处于运动中，贯穿空间。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 蓝宝词典 ... pompous adj. 傲慢的，自大的，夸大的 ponderable adj. 有价值的，有重量的 ponderous adj. 笨重的，笨拙的.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... ponder 仔细考虑 ponderable 可估量的 ponderous 笨重的，笨拙的.
蓝宝词典 ... pompous adj. 傲慢的，自大的，夸大的 ponderable adj. 有价值的，有重量的 ponderous adj. 笨重的，笨拙的.
沉思, 深思的英文翻译 ... ponderability 可秤性, 有重 ponderable 可以估计的 ponderable amount 可估计量.

list.abs: 思文名字的含义... ... 思念[ yearn;miss;long for;think of] 思前想后[ ponder over;think of the past and future] 思情[ miss].

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin ponderabilis, from ponderare 'weigh, reflect on' (see ponder)

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being weighed or considered;

sentences.sentence: "something ponderable from the outer world--something of which we can say that its weight is so and so"- James Jeans
"space flight to other galaxies becomes more cogitable"

auth_sentence.content: For Gingrich, though, everything is ponderable, particularly the imponderables.
auth_sentence.res_content: For Gingrich, though, everything is ponderable, particularly the imponderables.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For Gingrich, though, everything is ponderable, particularly the imponderables.

auth_sentence.content: National Budgets, like cuff adjustments in a plummeting lift, represent the triumph of the ponderable over the imponderable.
auth_sentence.res_content: National Budgets, like cuff adjustments in a plummeting lift, represent the triumph of the ponderable over the imponderable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: National Budgets, like cuff adjustments in a plummeting lift, represent the triumph of the ponderable over the imponderable.
